plot: A nerdy junior high student who works in a floral shop after school finds a fossilized talking Venus Fly Trap with the ability to hypnotize people.
plot_en: A nerdy junior high student who works in a floral shop after school finds a fossilized talking Venus Fly Trap with the ability to hypnotize people.
plot_es: A nerdy junior high student who works in a floral shop after school finds a fossilized talking Venus Fly Trap with the ability to hypnotize people.
title: Little Shop
